tips.title: Container Gardening Essentials
tips.description: Choose containers with drainage holes, use quality potting soil, and select plants based on your available sunlight. Water consistently but don't overwater.

tips.title: Vertical Gardening for Small Spaces
tips.description: Maximize your space by growing upward using trellises, wall planters, or hanging baskets. Perfect for vining plants like beans, peas, and cascading flowers.

tips.title: Indoor Herb Garden Guide
tips.description: Place herbs near a south-facing window for 6-8 hours of sunlight daily. Basil, mint, parsley, and chives are perfect starter herbs that thrive indoors.

tips.title: Watering Best Practices
tips.description: Water deeply but less frequently to encourage strong root growth. Morning watering reduces evaporation and fungal diseases. Consider a drip irrigation system.
